subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the capital of Rajasthan?
explanation_en: The capital of Rajasthan is Jaipur.
explanation_hindi: राजस्थान की राजधानी जयपुर है। राजस्थान की राजधानी जयपुर है।

subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: What is the significance of Chittorgarh Fort?
question_hi: चतुर्गरहस्थान के किस विभिज्ञान क्या है ?
A_en: Chittorgarh Fort is a symbol of Rajasthan's rich history.
B_en: Chittorgarh Fort played a significant role in the life of Mewar Dynasty.
C_en: Chittorgarh Fort was built by Rana Kumbha in 12th century.
D_en: Chittorgarh Fort represents the struggle of Rajputs against the Mughals.
E_en: Chittorgarh Fort was the location of the famous Chittor Resistance in 1535.
F_en: Chittorgarh Fort is associated with the life of Rana Meera.
